divs: sighting detailsi am a member of mufon and a witness to the 3-24-09 ufo + fighter jets in cat + mouse game over san fernando valley with multiple witnesses + photos. i took some of the photos. the event repeated 2 days later on 3-26-09. the initial report and photos can be read at this website http:\\www.starfiretor.com\ufo_fighterjets_1streportsphotointro_3-24-09.htm the photos have been analyzed and determined to be authentic and unaltered. the ufo and one of the fighter jets can be seen in 1 of the photos. photo analysis shows that the ufo is a physical object that is at least twice the size of the fighter jet. great care has gone into uploading the photos in their purest form. there are also blow-ups for better clarity. i can arrange to send my photos directly to mufon, pending a request.
Summary: 3-24-09 UFO + fighter jets in cat + mouse game over San Fernando Valley with multiple witnesses + photos.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around March 24th 2009
